price: 173. En Wij lieten op hen een regen vallen (van stenen). En hoe kwaad was de regen van degenen die gewaarschuwd waren.
arabic: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِم مَّطَرٗاۖ فَسَآءَ مَطَرُ ٱلۡمُنذَرِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-amṭarnā ʿalayhim maṭaran fasāa maṭaru al-mundharīna
